name: John Eisenmann
notable_works: The Arcade; Case Western Reserve University buildings
notes: One of Ohio's first formally trained architects.

name: George H. Smith
notable_works: The Arcade; Cleveland Trust Company Building
notes: Specialized in large public and commercial buildings.

name: Walker and Weeks
notable_works: Cleveland Public Library; Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland
notes: Prolific Cleveland firm in Beaux-Arts style.

name: John Wellborn Root
notable_works: Society for Savings Building; Rookery Building (Chicago)
notes: Early skyscraper innovator, cofounder of the Chicago School.
